column4: what passcode should i enter in my mobilephone when trying to connect with bluetooth?
how do i se passcode on ubuntu?
when you connect from the phone, a box should pop up on Ubuntu
if not, make sure you have bluetooth and bluez-utils installed
i have, and can see my phone but cant connect, since the phoe is asking for a passcode
oh, the package is called bluez-pin
which side are you initiating the connection from?
when initiating from ubuntu, phone says that someone is trying to connect and asks for passcode
how did you initiate from Ubuntu? (I've never figured it out, I always initiate from the phone)
when trying from phone i see my computer but then it asks again for passcode, and ubuntu doesnt respond
when doing it from the phone, enter any passcode you want, and then enter the same one when the box pops up on ubuntu
thanks a lot, this was so stupif :D
ahh, multisync works, this is my day!
